metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7985 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The CALM FAST parser in tcpdump before 4.9.0 has a buffer overflow in print-calm-fast.c:calm_fast_print().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7985` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.0-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.0-1ubuntu1~ubuntu14.04.1').
